text: “Ndipo anyamata awiri adalowa m’ndende pamodzi ndi iye. Mmodzi mwa iwo adati (kumuuza Yûsuf): “Ndithu ine ndalota ndikufulula mowa.” Ndipo wina adati: “Ndithu ine ndalota ndikusenza mikate pamutu panga yomwe idali kudyedwa ndi mbalame. Tiuze tanthauzo lake. Ndithu ife tikukuona iwe kuti ndiwe mmodzi wa anthu abwino.”
